messages: "...everybody should have true love, and it should last as long as your life does." The Fault In Our Stars is going to make me a mess.
"...everybody should have true love, and it should last as long as your life does." The Fault In Our Stars is going to make me a mess.
Needless to say, I am over it. Why does the polar vortex have to happen the first winter I DON'T have an SUV? The focus isn't cutting it.
"...everybody should have true love, and it should last as long as your life does." The Fault In Our Stars is going to make me a mess.
